name: OpenClaw Projects Plugin
description: Memory provider with projects, todos, and contacts integration

apiUrl.description: Backend API URL (must be HTTPS in production)

apiKey.description: API authentication key (direct value, least secure)

apiKeyFile.description: Path to file containing API key (e.g., ~/.secrets/api_key)

apiKeyCommand.description: Command to execute to get API key (e.g., op read op://Personal/openclaw/api_key)

twilioAccountSidFile.description: Path to file containing Twilio Account SID

twilioAccountSidCommand.description: Command to get Twilio Account SID

twilioAuthTokenFile.description: Path to file containing Twilio Auth Token

twilioAuthTokenCommand.description: Command to get Twilio Auth Token

twilioPhoneNumberFile.description: Path to file containing Twilio Phone Number

twilioPhoneNumberCommand.description: Command to get Twilio Phone Number

postmarkTokenFile.description: Path to file containing Postmark Token

postmarkFromEmailFile.description: Path to file containing Postmark From Email

postmarkFromEmailCommand.description: Command to get Postmark From Email

secretCommandTimeout.description: Timeout for secret command execution in milliseconds

autoRecall.description: Automatically recall relevant memories on conversation start

autoCapture.description: Automatically capture important information as memories
